projects.title: Discord Scam Detection Bot
projects.description: An intelligent Discord bot that automatically detects and filters spam messages using regex patterns, fuzzy string matching, and semantic similarity analysis.
projects.shortDescription: An intelligent Discord bot that automatically detects and filters spam messages.

features.label: Discord API:
features.text: Used the Discord API to create a bot that can detect and filter spam messages

features.label: AWS EC2 Hosting:
features.text: Hosted the bot on an AWS EC2 instance using GitHub

features.label: Multi-layered spam detection:
features.text: Pattern matching (regex), Fuzzy string comparison, Semantic similarity (SentenceTransformer)

features.label: Adaptive learning system:
features.text: Persistent dataset storage, Dynamic threshold calculation, Pattern recognition from deleted messages

features.label: Server-specific configuration:
features.text: JSON-based persistence, Environment variable secrets, Configurable admin channels

features.label: Administrative controls:
features.text: Permission-gated operations, Approval workflow system, Comprehensive logging

features.label: Modular architecture:
features.text: Separated concerns (filtering, config, admin), Independent component scaling, Extensible detection methods

features.label: User-based weighting:
features.text: Join time consideration, Configurable time thresholds, Weighted scoring system

projects.title: And Then I Woke Up Game
projects.description: A game exploring the five stages of grief that won the GDDC Game Jam 2025. Uses GDScript, showcasing game development skills and creative problem-solving.
projects.shortDescription: A game exploring the five stages of grief that won the GDDC Game Jam 2025.

features.text: Built in Godot using node-based architecture
Core entities (player, enemies, projectiles) implemented as CharacterBody2D nodes
Global singleton manages game state and level progression
Enemy AI uses behavior trees with inheritance for different types
Combat system implements pool pattern for projectile management
Scene-based structure with dedicated level management nodes
Signal-based interaction and dialogue systems
State machine pattern for gameplay state transitions
Modular design with clear separation of concerns

projects.title: JavaScript Drum Kit
projects.description: Created an interactive virtual drum kit with preloaded sounds and easy sound swapping functionality.
projects.shortDescription: Created an interactive virtual drum kit with preloaded sounds.

features.text: Implemented Web Audio API for real-time sound processing and playback
Created event-driven architecture for keyboard and mouse interactions
Built custom audio manager for sound library and playback control
Utilized AudioContext for precise timing and sound manipulation
Implemented responsive design with CSS Grid
Added visual feedback system for user interactions
Created modular component structure for easy maintenance
Implemented keyboard event listeners for drum triggers
Added sound preloading for seamless playback

projects.title: Broomstick Chase Game
projects.description: Unity minigame scripted in C# where players chase a flying golden ball on a broomstick while dodging obstacles and opponents.
projects.shortDescription: Unity minigame scripted in C# where players chase a flying golden ball.

features.text: Key Interactions:
subItems: Player collides with Bludgers/Chasers → knockback and score reset
Player reaches End Trigger/Snitch → win condition
Spawners instantiate obstacles at random vertical positions

features.text: Game Flow:
subItems: Player avoids obstacles while moving toward End Trigger/Snitch
Game ends on win (reaching End Trigger) or loss (knockback too far)

features.text: Technical Implementation:
subItems: Unity physics for collision detection and movement
Random number generation for obstacle spawning and movement offsets
